item.description: Hello there! # My name is Tayyab Jafar, you can call me Tay for short. I am a former Astrophysics student from Queen’s University, but now currently attending Sheridan College for my Honours Bachelor of Information Sciences (Cyber Security) with an expected graduation date of August 2023. Read on below to see a summary of my work experience, and check out the projects I’ve made here. Contact # GitHub LinkedIn
